alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; New Kent; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:47AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Kent, southeastern Henrico and southeastern Hanover Counties and the City of Richmond through 815 AM EDT... At 747 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highland Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, lightning and possible small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Mechanicsville, Highland Springs, East Highland Park, Bottoms Bridge, Orapax Farms, Elko, Montrose, Sandston, Glendale, Richmond International, Fair Oaks, Varina and Richmond Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; New Kent; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
